warningMessage:
[b][color=red]ðŸš¨ !Attention! ðŸš¨[/color][/b]
[color=green] Please note, if there's no activity in the next 5 minutes, you will be set to AFK status, and your rank/level will not increase. Feel free to talk or type to stay active![/color]
[b][color=red] It may take up to 2 minutes for the status change to take effect.[/color][/b]
You can also type anything in this chat window to remain active.
afkMessage: Moved to AFK: No activity for 1 hour. Join when ready!
welcomeMessage:
Welcome to [b][color=#24336b]North[/color][color=#0095db]Industries[/color][/b] - Secure Gaming Services!
Let's get you set up quickly, [b]it only takes 3 questions[/b], and you can [b]create a channel[/b] at the end.
whatIsYourLanguage: [color=green][b]What is your preferred language? Examples [/b][/color][color=red](de|en|pl|ru)[/color] Detected:
skipSetup: To skip the setup, just type [color=red]skipsetup[/color] here in the chat window, but you will miss your chance to have [color=red]your own channel[/color]!
setupSkipped: OK, no problem! Setup skipped. Have fun!
notValidCountryCode: [color=green][b]This is not a valid country code! Examples: (de/us/pl/ir). Check [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2#Officially_assigned_code_elements]this list[/url] for more info.[/b][/color]
acceptRules:
[color=green][b]Do you agree with our [/b][/color][url=https://north-industries.com/teamspeak-connect/#rules]rules[/url]? [color=red](yes/no)[/color]
It's okay if you don't, but be aware that you might face some restrictions.
rankingDisabled:
[color=green][b]Do you want ranking enabled?[/b][/color] [color=red](yes/no)[/color]
You will not get AFK status but also no rank!
setupComplete:
[b]Setup is complete![/b] Thank you!
Enjoy your time on [b][color=#24336b]North[/color][color=#0095db]Industries[/color][/b] - Secure Gaming Services!
Type [color=red]help[/color] for a full list of features.
howToHelpToday:
[b][color=#24336b]North[/color][color=#0095db]Industries[/color][/b] - Secure Gaming Services!
How can I help you today?
successSetLanguage: Your preferred language has been successfully set!
restartSetup: Setup cleared. You are ready to start over!
addPassword: Add a password to your channel if you want!
notEnoughTime: Sorry, but you have not spent enough time on this server to create a channel (30 min). Spend some time with users in other channels, and I will inform you when you can create your channel.
enoughTime: You have now completed the 30-minute mark and are now able to create your own channel. Type createmychannel in this chat window when you are ready.
alreadHaveChannel: You already have a channel! If you want to delete your channel, type deletemychannel.
skippedSetupNoChannel: You skipped the setup and cannot create channels or buy features. You can type restart to restart the onboarding process.
noChannelToMove: You do not have a channel to move into! Create a channel first with createmychannel.
sendTestText: Sends a testing text back in your language.
channelDeleted: Channel deleted. You can now type [color=red]restart[/color] to restart your setup!
noChannelToDelete: You don't have a channel to delete.
movesIntoYourChannel: Moves you into your own channel.
workInProgress: Work in Progress! Use at your own risk :D
noDailyStatus: Don't want to receive your daily status anymore? Just type 'disablestatus' here.
steamAddSuccess: Your Steam ID has been successfully added.
notAcceptedRules: Sorry, that is not possible since you have not accepted our rules! Type 'restart' to restart the onboarding!!
enterAndUseChannel: Congrats! You can now enter and use channels with ðŸ”’ on them.
noCreditToYourself: You cannot send credits to yourself!
contactAdmin: If you keep getting errors, please contact an admin!
stillHaveChannel: You still have a channel! If you want to delete your channel and start over, type [color=red]deletemychannel[/color]!
disableStatusMessage: To disable this message, just type [color=red]disablestatus[/color]. For more commands, type [color=red]help[/color]!
sendcredit: Send some credits to other users.
stillNoChannel: You still have not created your own free channel! Just type createmychannel.
disableStatus: Disables or enables the daily status message.
addSteam: Add your Steam ID to get rewards for voting. Check out [url=https://www.steamidfinder.com/]this page[/url] to find your ID.
shopDescript: Unlock additional features. Type shop or buy for more info.
